overview:
As Chief Service Officer, Claude is responsible for building and managing a world-class team capable of meeting intellectual and delivery demands across Syncapseâ€™s strategic, technical, measurement and professional services teams.

Previously Senior Vice President and Managing Director of Rogers Digital Media, Claude has a wealth of experience leading digital strategy, operations and sales. Claude has also held senior leadership positions at Alliance Atlantis Communications, Astral Media and the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation.

Claude actively participates in the digital media industry in Canada, with positions on the Board of Directors for the Banff World Television Festival and the Interactive Advertising Bureau.
